p: Vegetation cover differed significantly between microsites in both the mesic grassland and the arid scrubland (ANOVA: mesic grassland: Chi 2 = 17.01, p < 0.001, arid scrubland: Chi 2 = 56.20, p < 0.001), but not at the semi-arid savannah (Chi 2 = 0.99, p > 0.1, Table 1, Fig. 2, see Supplementary Table S.1 for further details). Furthermore, there was significantly higher vegetation cover at collapsed burrows than at fresh burrows in the semi-arid savannah site (Chi 2 = 7.71, p < 0.05), and a marginally significant difference between the burrow age classes in the mesic grassland (Chi 2 = 5.62, p = 0.06, Supplementary Table S.1).
